issue.title: [Bug] {{Language translated from defaults back to English after translation}}
issue.body:
### Please search before asking

- [X] I searched in the [issues](https://github.com/yetone/openai-translator/issues) and found nothing similar.


### Please read README

- [X] I have read the troubleshooting section in the README in detail.

### Please check your network and OpenAI API quota

- [X] I am sure it is not a network issue or an OpenAI API quota issue.

### OpenAI Translator version

0.0.89

### 系统/浏览器版本 System/Browser version

Windows 11 Home 22H2

### 复现步骤 Reproduce step

I'd select the language that's being translated from and the language that's being translated to and after a successfull translation, the language selection for the language that's being translated from defaults back to English. 



### 你看到了什么错误？What errors do you see?

The selection for the language that's being translated from to reset back to English after one successfull translation.

### 你期望看到什么？What did you expect to see?

The language selection for the language that's being translated from to stay the same after a successfull translation.

### 还有其他的内容吗？Anything else?

_No response_

### 你是否愿意提交一份 PR 来修改这个错误？Are you willing to submit a PR?

- [ ] 我愿意提供 PR! I'm willing to submit a PR!

issue.title: [Bug] Azure API的说明文档中需要针对0613模型进行更新
issue.body:
### Please search before asking

- [X] I searched in the [issues](https://github.com/yetone/openai-translator/issues) and found nothing similar.


### Please read README

- [X] I have read the troubleshooting section in the README in detail.

### Please check your network and OpenAI API quota

- [X] I am sure it is not a network issue or an OpenAI API quota issue.

### OpenAI Translator version

0.1.38

### 系统/浏览器版本 System/Browser version

macOS 14.0/Chrome 版本 118.0.5993.117（正式版本） (x86_64)

### 复现步骤 Reproduce step

现有关于Azure API的配置说明如下，
const API_URL = `https://${resourceName}.openai.azure.com`
const API_URL_PATH = `/openai/deployments/${deployName}/completions?api-version=${apiVersion}`

这爱之前Azure的模型里使用是正常的，
但最近Azure更新0613模型后，这个写法就失效了。
需要在URL_PATH的deployname之后加上/chat/，即把第二行改为：
const API_URL_PATH = `/openai/deployments/${deployName}/chat/completions?api-version=${apiVersion}`

### 你看到了什么错误？What errors do you see?

如果不改写，会报错error 无法在此模型下工作。

### 你期望看到什么？What did you expect to see?

更新wiki

### 还有其他的内容吗？Anything else?

无

### 你是否愿意提交一份 PR 来修改这个错误？Are you willing to submit a PR?

- [ ] 我愿意提供 PR! I'm willing to submit a PR!

comment.body:
> ${deployName}

你把${deployName}换成你部署的名称了不？

issue.body:

0.1.38

vivaldi (see bellow)

### 复现步骤 Reproduce step

select translate texte, no translation showed !?

![image](https://github.com/openai-translator/openai-translator/assets/24865815/4d461caf-b59b-4087-a819-65bb0115e0d7)
---
config
![image](https://github.com/openai-translator/openai-translator/assets/24865815/ea8bfc3d-439f-4b75-b246-ce2430ec9243)


### 你看到了什么错误？What errors do you see?

none

### 你期望看到什么？What did you expect to see?

a translation

### 还有其他的内容吗？Anything else?

browser:

<html>
<body>
<!--StartFragment-->

Vivaldi | 6.2.3105.58 (Stable channel) (64 bits)
-- | --
Révision | 160afb130e98d47754ca92d477dfe950a5c0b4c1
Système d’exploitation | Windows 10 Version 22H2 (Build 19045.3570)
JavaScript | V8 11.6.189.22
Agent utilisateur | Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/116.0.0.0 Safari/537.36
Ligne de commande | "C:\Users\jonle\AppData\Local\Vivaldi\Application\vivaldi.exe" --flag-switches-begin --flag-switches-end --origin-trial-disabled-features=WebGPU --save-page-as-mhtml

<!--EndFragment-->
</body>
</html>

### 你是否愿意提交一份 PR 来修改这个错误？Are you willing to submit a PR?

- [ ] 我愿意提供 PR! I'm willing to submit a PR!

comment.body: 其他大佬在修改了，等更新吧

issue.title: [Bug] Azure API的说明文档中需要针对0613模型进行更新
issue.body:
### Please search before asking

- [X] I searched in the [issues](https://github.com/yetone/openai-translator/issues) and found nothing similar.


### Please read README

- [X] I have read the troubleshooting section in the README in detail.

### Please check your network and OpenAI API quota

- [X] I am sure it is not a network issue or an OpenAI API quota issue.

### OpenAI Translator version

0.1.38

### 系统/浏览器版本 System/Browser version

macOS 14.0/Chrome 版本 118.0.5993.117（正式版本） (x86_64)

### 复现步骤 Reproduce step

现有关于Azure API的配置说明如下，
const API_URL = `https://${resourceName}.openai.azure.com`
const API_URL_PATH = `/openai/deployments/${deployName}/completions?api-version=${apiVersion}`

这爱之前Azure的模型里使用是正常的，
但最近Azure更新0613模型后，这个写法就失效了。
需要在URL_PATH的deployname之后加上/chat/，即把第二行改为：
const API_URL_PATH = `/openai/deployments/${deployName}/chat/completions?api-version=${apiVersion}`

### 你看到了什么错误？What errors do you see?

如果不改写，会报错error 无法在此模型下工作。

### 你期望看到什么？What did you expect to see?

更新wiki

### 还有其他的内容吗？Anything else?

无

### 你是否愿意提交一份 PR 来修改这个错误？Are you willing to submit a PR?

- [ ] 我愿意提供 PR! I'm willing to submit a PR!

comment.body: 我用“const API_URL_PATH = /openai/deployments/${deployName}/chat/completions?api-version=${apiVersion}”这个格式也不行啊，报错“resource not found”。

issue.title: fix Web API
issue.body: GPT-3.5 also needs an arkose token now. I put the arkose script in , now  we can use GPT-4 and GPT-3.5 in the Web API.

issue.title: ChatGPT web 可以获取模型，但是无法输出结果
issue.body:
### Please search before asking

- [X] I searched in the [issues](https://github.com/yetone/openai-translator/issues) and found nothing similar.


### Please read README

- [X] I have read the troubleshooting section in the README in detail.

### Please check your network and OpenAI API quota

- [X] I am sure it is not a network issue or an OpenAI API quota issue.

### OpenAI Translator version

v0.0.89

### 系统/浏览器版本 System/Browser version

Edge  118.0.2088.69 

### 复现步骤 Reproduce step

选择ChatGPT web 模式：
正常的输入待翻译的内容提交后，没有任何返回，可以看到翻译完成的标志（Translated）

选择openai api 模式：
一切正常。

### 你看到了什么错误？What errors do you see?

无

### 你期望看到什么？What did you expect to see?

翻译结果

### 还有其他的内容吗？Anything else?

_No response_

### 你是否愿意提交一份 PR 来修改这个错误？Are you willing to submit a PR?

- [X] 我愿意提供 PR! I'm willing to submit a PR!

issue.title: [建议功能] 建议服务提供商增加 讯飞星火AI的服务接口
issue.body:
### Search before asking

- [X] 在 [issues](https://github.com/yetone/openai-translator/issues) 中没有找到类似的内容。
I searched in the [issues](https://github.com/yetone/openai-translator/issues) and found nothing similar.


### feature

建议服务提供商增加 讯飞星火AI的服务接口

### 描述 Motivation

强烈建议在【服务提供商】中增加讯飞星火AI大模型的 API 服务接口能力 , https://xinghuo.xfyun.cn/sparkapi


### Solution

强烈建议在【服务提供商】中增加讯飞星火AI大模型的 API 服务接口能力 , https://xinghuo.xfyun.cn/sparkapi


### 还有其他内容吗？Anything else?

强烈建议在【服务提供商】中增加讯飞星火AI大模型的 API 服务接口能力 , https://xinghuo.xfyun.cn/sparkapi


### 你是否愿意提交一份 PR？Are you willing to submit a PR?

- [ ] 我愿意提供 PR! I'm willing to submit a PR!
